Aden Vanguard Captain Adolph:
Looks like You made a choice. If you are ready, go to the enemy's camp. That You have to do, nothing complicated. Will need to just destroy all the enemies that will come across on the eyes. The fight will be fierce. If I fall, You will need to flee this place. I can't so You died with me. As for me - don't exist. I guess who will take over my post... Are you ready?
